body_html:
I see... How is IsDirectory() implemented for that file system? How expensive is that call? Any pointers would be great to look into.

My hunch is that if that involves network I/O etc. to accomplish and we're doing that call serially in GetMatchingPaths() that would be the bottleneck. Multi-threading that piece of code should help... but I want to get to a reproducible scenario first so that we can compare the time taken before and after.

body:
I see... How is IsDirectory() implemented for that file system? How expensive is that call? Any pointers would be great to look into.

My hunch is that if that involves network I/O etc. to accomplish and we're doing that call serially in GetMatchingPaths() that would be the bottleneck. Multi-threading that piece of code should help... but I want to get to a reproducible scenario first so that we can compare the time taken before and after.
